# positionDidChangeHandler

**Instance Property**

The block that the profile calls when the value of the switch changes.

## Declaration

```swift
var positionDidChangeHandler: ((any GCPhysicalInputElement, any GCSwitchPositionInput, Int) -> Void)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The block’s parameters are:



## Getting the position

- **position**: The position of the switch.
- **lastPositionTimestamp**: A timestamp for when the profile reports the last position.
- **lastPositionLatency**: The time in seconds between the current and previous positions.
